title: mouse going haywire in game
body: i use a MacBook Pro and recently updated my OS to the latest version, I use a Razor Deathadder Chroma mouse and updated its software as well. My mouse worked fine until I got in my game and then it was jerking all over the place and i could barely buy items in the shop... And, it didn't move me around the map or select champs etc, reliably, i was just roaming all over the place, and the cursor was jerking around my screen...

replies.body:
Does this still happen after disabling Razer Synapse or trying a [safe mode boot](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201262)?

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
sorry i didn't see this... i had to go in and change up all my in game settings and it eventually leveled out and was playable...
Have you tried contacting their support team? You can create a support ticket at http://www.razersupport.com/contact-us/ , they can probably replace it for you if its under warranty.
